ability_context.h
=================

**Overview**\ 
--------------

**Related Modules:**

`AbilityKit <abilitykit.md>`__

**Description:**

Declares functions for starting and stopping an ability.

The **Ability** and **AbilitySlice** classes are inherited from the
**AbilityContext** class for you to call functions in this class for
application development.

**Since:**

1.0

**Version:**

1.0

**Summary**\ 
-------------
